Author.item: Potter, B. A.; Reuther, J. D.; Lowenstein, J. M.; Scheuenstuhl, G.

Title.item: Assessing the reliability of pRIA for identifying ancient proteins from archaeological contexts

Excluded.item: Very reluctant exlcusion, since the authors did all the work to be included in this review. However they do not include any of the dates which they measured in their paper, only say that they did them and that the site is from between 11,000 BP and 9,600 BP, without any of the measurements that they took to arrive at this conclusion
